title: [Large-scale] Mobile-based Career Guidance Simulation Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and general understanding of career exploration
context.additional_context: Customized career design course for learners preparing to enter STEM fields, strengthening field experience learning through personalized mobile device usage and VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more specific career paths by analyzing science-related career information provided in mobile applications
Learners can experience work environments in science-related job sites through VR simulations and derive five or more required competencies
Learners can create personal career portfolios and revise them two or more times using feedback systems within the application

resources: Mobile application prototype for career exploration

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
